entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
